name: Association of the Greek Industry of Detergents and Soaps
membership:
We are a Member of A.I.S.E.
(https://www.aise.eu/default.aspx)
goal:
Our members are producers and importers of detergents and household maintenance products (biocides included).
We provide regular info to our members on all topics above and we advocate the sector's positions/interests to respective greek authorities.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Internal Market, Public Health
euInitiatives: CLP, Detergents regulation, Biocides, REACH, Air-freshners, Transport of Dangerous Goods, better regulation, sustainability, Seveso Directive, Chemical weapons, Explosive percursors, ingredients issues, environmental issues etc.
